import React, { useState } from "react"; import {Avatar, Button} from "@mui/material"; import "./Post.css"; import Typography from "@mui/material/Typography"; import Card from '@mui/material/Card'; import MoreHorizIcon from "@mui/icons-material/MoreHoriz"; import FavoriteBorderIcon from "@mui/icons-material/FavoriteBorder"; import ChatBubbleOutlineIcon from "@mui/icons-material/ChatBubbleOutline"; import TelegramIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Telegram"; import BookmarkBorderIcon from "@mui/icons-material/BookmarkBorder"; import FmdGoodOutlinedIcon from '@mui/icons-material/FmdGoodOutlined'; import MapOutlinedIcon from '@mui/icons-material/MapOutlined'; import SentimentSatisfiedOutlinedIcon from '@mui/icons-material/SentimentSatisfiedOutlined'; import Grid from "@mui/material/Grid"; import ShareModal from "../../components/ShareModal/ShareModal"; function Post( {user, postImage, likes, caption, address, timestamp, is_voucher, is_ad}) { if (is_voucher && is_ad) { return(
{user.charAt(1).toUpperCase()} {user} • {timestamp} • Advertisement
{address}
{/* Left Section */} Voucher Giảm 50% với tất cả món gà Ngày hết hạn: 31/01/2025 Số lượng còn: 36 {/* Right Section */}
{likes} likes
{user} {caption}
View all 13,384 comments
) } else if (is_voucher && !is_ad) { return(
{user.charAt(1).toUpperCase()} {user} • {timestamp}
{address}
{/* Left Section */} Voucher Giảm 50% với tất cả món gà Ngày hết hạn: 31/01/2025 Số lượng còn: 36 {/* Right Section */}
{likes} likes
{user} {caption}
View all 13,384 comments
) } else if (!is_voucher && is_ad) { return(
{user.charAt(1).toUpperCase()} {user} • {timestamp} • Advertisement

{address}
{likes} likes
{user} {caption}
View all 13,384 comments
) } else { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false); return(
{user.charAt(1).toUpperCase()} {user} • {timestamp}
{address}
setOpen(true)}>
{likes} likes
{user} {caption}
View all 13,384 comments
) } } export default Post
